A

AbstractCard - Class in cardsMechanics
the abstract class of the implementation of the Card interface, it compiles various methods common of the specific card types.
AbstractCard(String) - Constructor for class cardsMechanics.AbstractCard
Constructor to make cards, it receives the name of the card, and the rest of the fields are initialized with the method setCardDefault AbstractCard.setCardDefault().
actOn(Card) - Method in class cardsMechanics.AbstractCard
 
actOn(Card) - Method in interface cardsMechanics.Card
Makes this card interact on the card passed as parameter.
actOnAssasin(Assassin) - Method in class cardsMechanics.AbstractCard

Assassin - Class in cardsMechanics
A class that represent the Assassin type of card.
Assassin(String) - Constructor for class cardsMechanics.Assassin
 
attackOn(Card, double) - Method in class cardsMechanics.AbstractCard
makes the damage counter of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the damage counter is done by calling the damageBy method Card.damagedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
